review: We have Netflix but didn't want to have to purchase a compatible blu-ray player or game system to watch it in the bedroom.  This google chromecast is so easy to set up.  You plug it into a HDMI spot on the tv, download the app and follow the directions.  The instructions are very easy.  The only thing I don't like about it is the fat that you have to have it plugged into the wall the whole time it is in use.  It picks up the signal well though and you can watch Netflix and the other apps the same way you can on the game systems and blu ray players.  I was given one as a present and then had to purchase one for my dad as well.
author: Barbara G.
